meanings.definition: Having a strong or sturdy stem.
meanings.sent1: The oak tree looked even stemmier after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The sunflower had a stemmier stalk than the daisy.
meanings.sent3: The stemmier cactus refused to bend even in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as stemmier than a tree rooted in the ground.
meanings.sent5: The stemmier bamboo stood tall and proud in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The stemmier branches of the tree provided more shade.
meanings.sent2: The stemmier vines grew faster than the thinner ones.
meanings.sent3: The stemmier bushes seemed to be in a competition to reach the sky.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as stemmier as the louder speaker in the room.
meanings.sent5: The stemmier rope held the weight without breaking.
